localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
During a short squeeze in October 2008, Volkswagen briefly became the largest company in the world. 

It would then fall 93% before bottoming in May 2010 and is still 80% below its October 2008 high today.

https://t.co/GUs6pNWfgE

Chart via @ycharts https://t.co/8ANHCd567B
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
在2008年10月的短暂挤压中，大众汽车短暂地成为世界上最大的公司。

随后在2010年5月触底之前，它将下跌93%，如今仍比2008年10月的高点低80%。

https://t.co/GUs6pNWfgE

图表来自@ycharts https://t.co/8ANHCd567B

在2008年10月的短暫擠壓中，大衆汽車短暫地成爲世界上最大的公司。

隨後在2010年5月觸底之前，它將下跌93%，如今仍比2008年10月的高點低80%。

https://t.co/GUs6pNWfgE

圖表來自@ycharts https://t.co/8ANHCd567B

previous.title: It's isn't just $GME. AMC, BlackBerry and Express have all experienced sharp moves without any apparent news to act as a driver while facing a large amount of bets against them. $AMC $BB $EXPR https://t.co/XOEk41wFh0

localize.full_text: 不仅仅是$GME。AMC、黑莓和快递都经历了急剧的走势，没有任何明显的消息来充当驱动力，同时面临着大量的对赌。$AMC $BB $EXPR https://t.co/XOEk41wFh0
不僅僅是$GME。AMC、黑莓和快遞都經歷了急劇的走勢，沒有任何明顯的消息來充當驅動力，同時面臨着大量的對賭。$AMC $BB $EXPR https://t.co/XOEk41wFh0

next.excerpt: Resquared is a web app that has data on every local business and makes it easy to reach out to them with built-in marketing tools. If you were trying to sell to restaurants, you’d open Resquared, create a search, and have access to thousands of restaurants.
next.title: Resquared - Marketing software for reaching local businesses.

localize.description: Resquared是一款网络应用，它拥有当地每家企业的数据，并通过内置的营销工具让你轻松接触到他们。如果你想向餐馆销售，你会打开Resquared，创建一个搜索，并可以访问成千上万的餐馆。
localize.tagline: 覆盖本地企业的营销软件。

localize.description: Resquared是一款網絡應用，它擁有當地每家企業的數據，並通過內置的營銷工具讓你輕鬆接觸到他們。如果你想向餐館銷售，你會打開Resquared，創建一個搜索，並可以訪問成千上萬的餐館。
localize.tagline: 覆蓋本地企業的營銷軟件。
